item.title: Version 1.2.19 (Build 20260114.6)
item.description:
What's New

Fix XKeyIM: standalone 'w' (ư) not accepting tone marks or undo

Problem: In XKeyIM with Telex/Simple Telex 2, typing 'w' produces 'ư'

(standalone), but then:

  • Adding tone marks (s/f/r/x/j) was blocked because 'ws', 'wf', etc.

were detected as English patterns

  • Typing 'ww' to undo back to 'w' was also blocked

Note: XKey main app was not affected by this issue.

Solution: Added logic in startsWithImpossiblePatternForRawInput() to

allow these patterns in Telex (0) and Simple Telex 2 (3) modes:

  • ws → ứ, wf → ừ, wr → ử, wx → ữ, wj → ự (standalone ư + tone)
  • ww → w (undo: ư back to w)

Also bumped build version to 20260114.6
